tool_description: Calculates optimal safety stock levels based on demand variability, lead time uncertainty, and desired service levels to minimize stockout risk.

demand_variability.description: Standard deviation of demand for each period

average_lead_time.description: Average supplier lead time in days

lead_time_variability.description: Standard deviation of lead time in days

error_messages: Mismatched array lengths: demand_forecasts and demand_variability must have the same length.
Invalid service level: service_level must be between 0.80 and 0.99.
Negative values: Lead times and variability values must be non-negative.
Zero lead time: average_lead_time must be greater than 0.
usage: Input demand forecasts with variability measures and lead time statistics to calculate optimal safety stock. Higher service levels result in higher safety stock requirements.

stockout_probability.description: Probability of stockout with calculated safety stock

carrying_cost_impact.description: Estimated additional carrying cost from safety stock
